CustomField.formula:
OwnerId
& MID("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ012345",( IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,1,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,1,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,2,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ") >0,2,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,3,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,4,0) +IF(FIND(MID (OwnerId,4,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,8,0) +IF (FIND(MID(OwnerId,5,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,16,0) )+1,1) & MID("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ012345",( IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,6,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ") >0,1,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,7,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,2,0) +IF(FIND(MID (OwnerId,8,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,4,0) +IF (FIND(MID(OwnerId,9,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,8,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,10,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ") >0,16,0) )+1,1) & MID ("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ012345",( IF(FIND(MID (OwnerId,11,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,1,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,12,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,2,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,13,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ") >0,4,0) +IF(FIND(MID(OwnerId,14,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,8,0) +IF(FIND(MID (OwnerId,15,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,16,0) )+1,1)
CustomField.label: Owner ID
